validation.message: Please see individual checks for details

checks.message: 'submitter_read_group_id' in metadata contains invalid character or is shorter then 2 characters: 'D0RH0/2'. Permissible characters include: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, - (hyphen), _ (underscore), : (colon), . (dot)
The total number of read groups in 'read_groups' section is 4. It does NOT match the number specified in read_group_count: 3.
Required field 'is_paired_end' should be Boolean type in read group: D0RE2.1.
FASTQ file(s) duplicated in 'file_r1/file_r2' of the 'read_groups' section in the metadata: 'D0RH0.2_r1.fq.bz2, D0RH0.2_r2.fq.bz2'
'read_group_id_in_bam' must NOT be populated in 'read_groups' section when it is not a BAM file: 'D0RE2.1', ''

All files in the 'files' section of the metadata JSON are required to have 'info.data_category' field being populated with 'Sequencing Reads'. File(s) found not conforming to this requirement: 'C0HVY.2_r2.fq.bz2, D0RH0.2_r1.fq.bz2, D0RH0.2_r2.fq.bz2'.

All files in the 'files' section of the metadata JSON are required to have 'dataType' field being populated with 'Submitted Reads'. File(s) found not conforming to this requirement: 'C0HVY.2_r2.fq.bz2, D0RE2.1_r1.fq.bz2, D0RH0.2_r1.fq.bz2'.
Field 'is_pair_end' for readgroup is null. Must be boolean: D0RE2.1
